Biała Podlaska  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bartoszyce, within Bartoszyce County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russian Federation. It lies approximately  west of Bartoszyce and  north of the regional capital Olsztyn.
